Diluvium lachrymarum a review of the fortunate & unfortunate adventurers : a satyr in burlesque, upon the famous lottery, set up in Freeman's-yard in Corn-hill.
12 p.
Printed and are to be sold by Randal Taylor, London : 1694.
In verse. "Price three pence." Imperfect: torn and slightly faded. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======
